home.title: Home

keyFeaturePlay.title: Player character customization
keyFeaturePlay.desc: Choose between different signature styles for your  character.

keyFeatureDecide.title: Decide the future and direction ofbountykinds
keyFeatureDecide.desc: Through holding the Bountykinds governance token.

keyFeatureExploration.title: Exploration
keyFeatureExploration.desc: Become a Bountykinds player and experience a  new world.

tradingMarket.title: Trading market
tradingMarket.desc: LA new day in the deep space trading market. It's a new world, a new life of prosperity for yourself. Deep underneath the surface, you are on the hunt for the precious minerals powering galactic trade.

trainingArea.title: Training Area
trainingArea.desc: The view is breath-taking. The power is overwhelming. The world is yours.You are drilling at the heart of a planet in the far reaches of deep space. The energy you produce could power a country. Those power plants from the ReBirth rewards drop came in handy after all.

mainMap.title: Main Map
mainMap.desc: The sound of wailing echoes across the plains. The Sogmian procession solemnly marches in step past their ancestors’ gravestones, still haunted by the fate of their leader. The sun begins to set as they bring Paizul’s cryopod at the top of the Rock of Light. As a beam of light consumes the pod to upload it to eternal rest with the ancients, Bekalu falls to his knees with a wrathful howl. The crowd is rattled to the core, a foreboding of things to come.

moonArea.title: Moon Area
moonArea.desc: Their Titan class warship served as a fortified city to protect them. Built in retaliation for the decimation of their species and the slaying of their leader, the Sogmian behemoth was a galactic alpha predator. This weapon of war was so intimidating it caused the other factions to encourage peace talks.

wormHole.title: Worm hole
wormHole.desc: The wormhole theory postulates that a theoretical passage through space-time could create shortcuts for long journeys across the universe. Wormholes are predicted by the theory of general relativity. But be wary: wormholes bring with them the dangers of sudden collapse, high radiation and dangerous contact with exotic matter.

slideInfor.des1: Five races that fight fiercely for the survival and pride of their own species. The war keeps continuing to expand till the point of extinction of all races.
slideInfor.des2: At that time, the heads of various tribes signed apact. Regardless of race, three strong teams that have achieved the most battle results in that year will govern the world for the next year. The world of Bountykinds is a one-year cycle with three months, and every three months the ranking of the battle resilts is decided and the rulers will be decided.

home.description: Bountykind is a play-to-earn, fantasy blockchain game based on Binance Chain. From the ashes of destruction, emperors will rise! Epic stories, action combat and classic roleplaying await those herors courageous enough to enter the fantastic world of Bountykinds!
home.history: Year 00 of new war calendar the endless battle for world reign has now begun
